channel.title: Python on Joyce Wang
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Joyce Wang

item.title: How R and Python Talk to Each Other
item.description: How R and Python Talk to Each Other Believe it or not, R and Python can talk to each other! This can be accomplished with the R package reticulate. For example: # Using R library(reticulate) # Load the `reticulate` package str1 = "This is how R" # Using Python str2 = "and python talk to each other." print(r.str1, str2) ## This is how R and python talk to each other.
